column3: Cardiff School of Sport and Health Sciences
column5: ​The MSc International Sport Management degree at Cardiff Met will enable you to develop the critical understanding, professional knowledge, skills and attitudes needed to take up a managerial position in the ever-expanding global sport and activity industry. This could be in leadership roles associated with researching the contemporary issues from across the globe, and challenges associated with the international business of modern sport; developing and delivering community sport and activity; developing and managing appropriate structures and environments for global elite sport and also the governance and administration of sport at a national and international level, in the modern, digital era.
column7: As a postgraduate, research or part-time student, the tuition fees you are charged will depend on the course you choose to study.
column9: 1-2 years full- time, 2-4 years part- time
